That's fantastic! It's great to hear that you're applying the techniques you learned at the HPDE course to your track days. Laguna Seca is a challenging track, but with the skills you're developing, I'm sure you'll have a blast!

Sonoma Raceway is an excellent track, and it's wonderful that you had a positive experience there. Alex sounds like a great instructor, and it's awesome that you were able to complete 20 laps without any incidents. That's a testament to your growing skills and focus on safety.

Receiving feedback from instructors is a crucial part of improving your driving skills. It's great that Alex was able to provide you with valuable insights to help you refine your technique. Did you find that you were able to implement any specific changes to your driving style during the Sonoma track day, and did you notice any improvements in your performance?

Also, how did you find the Sonoma Raceway track itself? It's known for its challenging corners and elevation changes. Were there any particular sections that you enjoyed or found challenging?
